SteamySnuggler sight

https://www.twitch.tv/steamysnuggler

#all_tanks #universal #anime #vtuber #steamysnuggler

Hello everyone. I decided to try something new, and make a sight. I know this image has been done before, but this was a test sight that I decided to make. If you have any tips on what I should do for future sight, feel free to type them in the comments. I'll probably stick to skins unless someone requests it or I just feel like making one. Hope you enjoy.

#russia #ru #aircraft #peshka #pe2 #pe3 #pe_2 #pe_3 #pe2205 #pe2110 #pe283 #plane #collimator #sight #rocket #rockets #rbs132 #m13uk

Gun and rocket sight for the Russian Peshka 2 and Peshka 3 bombers, per a request (don't get used to lots of Russian content). Includes sights for RBS-132 and M-13UK rockets.

TO AIM ROCKETS: Use the box and middle sights for speeds around 350kmh. Use the higher section for speeds at or over 420kmh, and the lower portion for speeds below 350kmh. the inner-most aiming area is for 600m, followed by 300m (going outwards), and ends with a 200m sight. Div...

#uk #britain #firecrest #rp3 #rocket #rockets #aircraft #plane #collimator #sight

6-17-25: General corrections

Gun and rocket sight for the British Blackburn Firecrest.

TO AIM ROCKETS: If coming in very shallow (at ground level) use the lowest aiming area almost always. If coming in for a regular attack, the Firecrest is comfortable between 15-35 degrees dive. Speeds marked are for 400kmh on the lowest areas, 450kmh on the mid-level areas, and 520kmh (or higher) for the higher areas. From inside to outside, the ranges to launch at are 600m ,300m, 200m. Keep in mind that closer...

#kay #saunders #girls_und_panzer #gup #girls_and_panzer #anime

Modern MBT sights with barrel adjusting reticle
Includes 6 versions. 3 versions dont have ui around the reticle.

The square in the middle of the reticle moves based on your current position of barrel. You can utilize it to shoot over terrain fully knowing your shot will not hit the ground. Best usage for this is HE or other slow velocity shells.

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

Evolved modern sights_Anura
This pack includes 5 versions

These sights includes all of my favorite features.
=>Box that disappears when you use laser rangefinder. For reflex shooting
=>Moveable second dot/reticle that shows current position of your barrel. Which is best used when shooting over terrain with HE munition.

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

#shirakami_fubuki #anime #vtuber #sight
Я говорил что для разнообразия буду выкладывать прицелы с аниме персонажами и выложив один такой прицел увидел что он понравился большинству людей поэтому вот вам ещё один такой прицел.

Здесь вам представлен Vtuber Shirakami Fubuki.

Как установить:
Заходите в папку WarThunder находите там папку UserSights дальше в папку all_tanks извлекаете прицел из моёй папки перезаходите в игру если она уже была открыта в момент того как ты добавлял прицел или при помощи специальных клавиш обновляете (пользовательскую прицельную сетку), "в настройках можно их...
